review: now as before the best diverting shooter for me   the hd textures cannot compensate the old 3d models  bad story almost none   those who like it will see a lot of gore spreading blood and flying bodyparts   very nice eastereggs again and patter  funny weapons like the chainsaw or even a hand cannon  animating sounds and new enemies will keep the gameflow  summary i would recommend it to everyone who likes arcade shooters with a lot of gore
